summary: Runtime administration: status, framework and gate management, analytics, config, diagnostics. One action per call—set `action` and required fields; chain admin steps with separate calls.

toolDescription.description:
⚙️ SYSTEM CONTROL: Retrieves system status, switches frameworks, manages gates, and provides analytics.

ACTIONS: status | framework | gates | analytics | config | maintenance | guide | session

Returns: Current state, configurations, or operation confirmations.

frameworkAware.enabled: ⚙️ SYSTEM CONTROL [FRAMEWORK]: Status includes active methodology context. Guide reflects current framework.
frameworkAware.disabled: ⚙️ SYSTEM CONTROL: Standard system status without methodology context.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The operation to perform: status (runtime overview), framework (switch/enable/disable methodologies), gates (manage quality gates), analytics (usage metrics), config (view/modify settings), maintenance (restart), guide (get recommendations), session (manage execution sessions).
notes: Single-call operations; sequence multiple admin steps with separate requests.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Sub-command for the selected action (e.g., framework switch/list/enable/disable; gates enable/disable/status/health/list; session list/clear/inspect).

parameters.name: session_id
parameters.description: Target session ID or chain ID for session operations.

parameters.name: framework
parameters.description: Target framework for switch operations. Use system_control(action:'framework', operation:'list') to see available frameworks.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Audit reason for framework/gate toggles or admin actions.

parameters.name: persist
parameters.description: When true, gate/framework enable/disable changes are also written to config.json.
notes: Applies to gate operations (enable/disable) and framework system enable/disable.
Uses SafeConfigWriter; falls back to runtime-only if unavailable.

parameters.name: search_query
parameters.description: Filter gates by keyword (matches ID, name, or description). Use with gates:list action.

commands.summary: Switch active framework with audit reason.
Enable framework system (with optional persistence to config).
Disable framework system (with optional persistence to config).
Enable gate system (with optional persistence to config).
Disable gate system (with optional persistence to config).
List available canonical gates with optional search filtering. Shortcut: >>gates [search]
Retrieve analytics summary with optional detail/history.
Clear a specific session or chain history.
